mapper.select: select n, board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, member_num, member_nick FROM(select rownum n, board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, member_num, MEMBER_NICK FROM (select board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, m.member_num, MEMBER_NICK from board b, member m WHERE b.MEMBER_NUM = m.MEMBER_NUM and board_type_num = 34 order by board_num)) where n between #{start} and #{end} ORDER BY n desc
select * from board b, member m, picture p where b.member_num = m.member_num and b.board_num = p.board_num and b.board_num=#{board_num}
mapper.update: update board set views=views+1 where board_num=#{board_num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where board_type_num = 34
mapper.insert: insert into board values((select nvl(max(board_num), 0)+1 from board), #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, 0, 34, 1)
insert into picture values((select nvl(max(picture_file_num), 0)+1 from picture), #{picture_fname}, (select nvl(max(board_num), 0) from board))
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where board_num=#{board_num}
update picture set picture_fname=#{picture_fname} where board_num=#{board_num}
